original_text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard.
korean_text: 천국은 마치 품꾼을 얻어 포도원에 들여보내려고 이른 아침에 나간 집 주인과 같으니

sentences.original_text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man
which went out early in the morning
to hire labourers into his vineyard
